title: Ron Howard | Yes We Kansas
description:
Kansas voters upheld abortion rights by 59% to 41% in yesterday’s election, and scientists have really bad news about some of our favorite foods. Ron Howard points out that his two most recent films, ‘Thirteen Lives’ and ‘We Feed People,’ both feature people selflessly volunteering to help others. ‘Thirteen Lives’ is in theaters now and coming to Prime Video this Friday!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
